person-live-in.legend: Does the person already live in your property?

when-person-moved-in.legend: When did the tenant move into your property?

before-or-after-1988.legend: Has the prospective tenant been in the UK since before 1988?

privacy-check.label: I confirm that I have read and understood this Data Protection statement.

date-tenant-moved-uk.legend: Date tenant moved to the UK
date-tenant-moved-uk.hint: For example 21 3 1980. Enter an approximate date if not known

extra-tenant-ni-num.label: National Insurance number
extra-tenant-ni-num.hint: This is on their National Insurance card, benefit letter, payslip or P60. For example, QQ 12 34 56 C
